attributes.action: Scrap the  TV Licensing fee and prosecute the BBC for bullying the nation with threatening letters
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are one of the last countries on earth practising TV licensing. This is serious offense to the human rights that says everyone should be entittled to receive free information. 
Scrap the BBC fee now! 
If the BBC can not convince each one of its customers to sign up a subscription fee is their problem, they should then get out of business, the government should not help them in forcing the public to pay for a service that nobody has ever requested.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
